video_description:
PhoneArena reviews the RIM BlackBerry PlayBook. RIM is embarking on a new venture into untested waters with their BlackBerry PlayBook. Dubbed as the first "professional grade tablet," RIM is placing a lot of attention to their bread and butter set of business customers with this one...
For more details, check out our web site: http://www.phonearena.com/
